func.title: GetIndexOf

param.name: array2search
param.desc: Array in which the element should be searched. The array can be zero, in which case the element is never found and -1 is returned.

param.name: needle
param.desc: The value to which every element of the array is to be compared.

func.desc: Finds the first occurrence of a value in an array and returns its zero-based index. If the element is not found, -1 is returned. The usual rules for comparison using the ==-operator apply.
